attributes.action: Begin to phase out disposable goods such as cigarette lighters, cameras, and electric toothbrushes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The title pretty much explains it. With so many problems being caused by waste plastics etc, it makes sense to start phasing out these single use items in favor of reusable ones. Also these will be changes that actually affect people and make them think about how they waste resources.
